title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Blended Education for Nursing Students' Self-Regulated Learning Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their learning abilities using self-regulated learning assessment tools and prepare outcome reports.
Learners establish concrete action plans to apply three core strategies—learning plan development, time management, and feedback utilization—in practice.
Learners monitor their learning process and derive improvement strategies through peer and self-assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
